strings.drefAccountCouldNotCreate: Could not create new operational update
strings.drefAccountConfirmMessage: You're about to approve this DREF. Once approved, it can no longer be edited. Are you sure you want to approve?
strings.drefAccountFinalizeConfirmMessage: You are about to finalize this DREF. Once finalized, the original language will change to English, and it will no longer be editable in the {selectedLanguage} language. Are you sure you want to proceed?
strings.dropdownActionNewOpsUpdateConfirmationMe: You are about to create a new DREF Operational Update.
strings.dropdownActionNewOpsUpdateLanguageSelect: Please select the language to create the DREF Operation Update.
strings.dropdownActionNewFinalReportConfirmation: You are about to create a new DREF Final Report.
strings.dropdownActionNewFinalReportLanguageSele: Please select the language to create the DREF Final Report.
strings.dropdownActionImminentNewOpsUpdateConfir: The DREF type will be changed to Response (from Imminent) for the Operational Update. Once created, you'll be able to change it to other types except Imminent. Are you sure you want to add an Operational Update?
